<a id="SpringBoneCollision3D"></a>

# SpringBoneCollision3D

**Inherits:** [Node3D](Node3D.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [SpringBoneCollisionCapsule3D](SpringBoneCollisionCapsule3D.md), [SpringBoneCollisionPlane3D](SpringBoneCollisionPlane3D.md), [SpringBoneCollisionSphere3D](SpringBoneCollisionSphere3D.md)

A base class of the collision that interacts with [SpringBoneSimulator3D](SpringBoneSimulator3D.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A collision can be a child of [SpringBoneSimulator3D](SpringBoneSimulator3D.md). If it is not a child of [SpringBoneSimulator3D](SpringBoneSimulator3D.md), it has no effect.

The colliding and sliding are done in the [SpringBoneSimulator3D](SpringBoneSimulator3D.md)'s modification process in order of its collision list which is set by [SpringBoneSimulator3D.set_collision_path()](SpringBoneSimulator3D.md#SpringBoneSimulator3D_method_set_collision_path). If [SpringBoneSimulator3D.are_all_child_collisions_enabled()](SpringBoneSimulator3D.md#SpringBoneSimulator3D_method_are_all_child_collisions_enabled) is ``true``, the order matches [SceneTree](SceneTree.md).

If [bone](SpringBoneCollision3D.md#SpringBoneCollision3D_property_bone) is set, it synchronizes with the bone pose of the ancestor [Skeleton3D](Skeleton3D.md), which is done in before the [SpringBoneSimulator3D](SpringBoneSimulator3D.md)'s modification process as the pre-process.

\ **Warning:** A scaled **SpringBoneCollision3D** will likely not behave as expected. Make sure that the parent [Skeleton3D](Skeleton3D.md) and its bones are not scaled.
